trans-unit.source: Indicates the first day of the week to use when calling date-related functions.
trans-unit.target: Gibt in Aufrufen datumsbezogener Funktionen an, welcher Tag den ersten Tag der Woche darstellen soll.

trans-unit.source: When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: Beim Aufrufen von Datumsfunktionen können Sie im Code anstelle der eigentlichen Werte der folgenden Enumerationsmember.

trans-unit.source: Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both.
trans-unit.target: Einige datumsbezogenen Funktionen akzeptieren eine `DayOfWeek` Argument, eine `WeekOfYear` Argument oder beides.

trans-unit.source: The `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `DayOfWeek` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
trans-unit.target: Die `FirstDayOfWeek` Enumeration gibt an, die gültigen Werte für die `DayOfWeek` Argumente sowie die möglichen Rückgabewerte von Funktionen.

trans-unit.source: The `DayOfWeek` argument takes the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration members.
Friday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbFriday" />.
trans-unit.target: Friday. Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbFriday" /> in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Monday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbMonday" />.
trans-unit.target: Monday. Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbMonday" /> in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Saturday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbSaturday" />.
trans-unit.target: Saturday. Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbSaturday" /> in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Sunday (default) This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbSunday" />.
trans-unit.target: Sunday (Standardeinstellung). Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbSunday" /> in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: The first day of the week as specified in your system settings This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbUseSystemDayOfWeek" />.
trans-unit.target: Der Wochentag, der in den Systemeinstellungen als erster Wochentag festgelegt ist. Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbUseSystemDayOfWeek" /> in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Thursday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbThursday" />.
trans-unit.target: Thursday. Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbThursday" /> in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Tuesday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbTuesday" />.
trans-unit.target: Tuesday. Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbTuesday" /> in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Wednesday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <see langword="vbWednesday" />.
trans-unit.target: Wednesday. Dieser Member entspricht der Konstante <see langword="vbWednesday" /> in Visual Basic.
